Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-exec, libasound2-dev, libbluetooth-dev (>= 5.0), libdbus-1-dev (>= 1.6), libfreeaptx-dev, libglib2.0-dev (>= 2.30), libsbc-dev (>= 1.2), liblc3-dev, libldacbt-enc-dev (>= 2.0.0) [!hppa !m68k !powerpc !ppc64 !s390x !sparc64], libldacbt-abr-dev (>= 2.0.0) [!hppa !m68k !powerpc !ppc64 !s390x !sparc64], libmp3lame-dev, libmpg123-dev, libspandsp-dev, libopus-dev, libbsd-dev, libreadline-dev, check, dbus-daemon <!nocheck>, python3-docutils, pkgconf, systemd-dev
